banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: "Home to Oakland" and "Walk Away"

nodes.whoTheyAre: Lisa Marie Johnston is a singer and songwriter from Oakland, CA. She blends country, Americana and blues to a “stomp and groove” style.

videoData.description: Celebrating her hometown of Oakland through her music and unique "stomp and groove" style, sing-songwriter Lisa Marie Johnston performs two songs that blend the country, Americana and blues genres.
videoData.socialDescription: Celebrating her hometown of Oakland through her music and unique "stomp and groove" style, sing-songwriter Lisa Marie Johnston performs two songs that blend the country, Americana and blues genres.
